a septoplasty was then performed throughout and a kelly incision on the right side.
a cartilaginous strut was then fashioned from the cartilaginous septum.

doyle splints were then placed within the nasal cavity and secured to the inferior septum using a 3-0 monofilament suture.
a denver external splint was then applied.
